trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hampton Bays
There were no other sightings in Hampton Bays on or around September 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the beach on the South Hampton shore. I was talking to someone and noticed a bright triangle in the sky with a large cloud of smoke behind it. Many of us stopped what we were doing and watched it. It lasted a little while and then disappeared instantly. I couldn't identify it... therefore I called it a UFO. Any idea what it was??
Summary: Bright triangle in the sky with a large cloud of smoke behind it - the triangle disappeared instantly.
